resources.title: English
resources.string: Main seller (To sell on behalf of the site)
Pay with Credits only mode ('Credits' app should be installed).
Single seller mode (To sell everything on behalf of the 'Main seller').
Day of month when invoices are automatically generated (1, 2, 3, etc)
Due date - days after invoice date
Number of days before invoice expiration to notify payer
Thank you! Payment was successfully performed. The data will be processed shortly. Please wait.
You need to fill in order number here.
You need to enter a name of an existed member here.
You need to fill in order number here.
You need to select a module here.
You need to select at least one item from the list here.
This field is essential. Please, fill it in.
This field is essential. Please, fill it in.
This field is essential. Please, fill it in.
Use correct email address or leave empty.
An attempt to pay with cash.

{email_header}

Hello,

A site member {profile_name} wanted to pay you with cash for:

{items}

Amount: {amount}
Date: {date}

Go to the pending orders page to process the order once the payment is received.

{email_footer}
The item was successfully added to your shopping cart.
The item was successfully deleted from your shopping cart.
Cancellation request was sent. Please wait.
Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription?
Single seller mode is enabled. Got to single shopping cart.
Can't connect to remote host for validation.
The vendor status is not active.
The vendor does not accept payments.
You need to select at least one item.
Buying from your own store is not permitted.
Cannot perform the action. Please report.
Subscription with the same data was already registered.
A message was sent to the seller ({0}), that you want to pay with cash for the following items. He should contact you shortly.
Isn't used to process payments directly. Is needed to store personal settings for usage in the other providers.
Select your own currency instead the default one
Generic payment provider isn't available for payments.
For offline payments like cash, etransfer, etc.
Email to send notifications about checkout attempts to. Leave empty to receive notifications on your profile email.
Offline payment provider isn't available for online payments.
Thank you! Subscription created. Please, check your email for further instructions.
Checkout with Credits isn't available now.
The type in which data is to be processed
Hide provider if you don't want to accept new payments but already have active subscriptions.
Email address which is used to access your PayPal account.
Email address which is used to access your PayPal account.
The product you want to subscribe to has incorrect data on PayPal end. Please report.
The subscription data isn't available or incorrect.
Thank you! Subscription created. Please, check your email for further instructions.
If enabled, users can checkout using Chargebee's hosted pages.
If enabled, users can checkout using Chargebee's drop-in script.
Activate(Deactivate) provider. Note. It's recommended to use SSL for better payment processing.
Hide provider if you don't want to accept new payments but already have active subscriptions.
Your site name registered in Chargebee for 'live' mode
Your Chargebee API Access key for 'live' mode
Your site name registered in Chargebee for 'test' mode
Your Chargebee API Access key for 'test' mode
Enable amount checking for Chargebee Webhooks (recomended). However checking should be disabled when discounts and coupons are used.
Enable SSL connection to communicate with Chargebee. Note. URLs below will be updated after saving.
Thank you! Subscription created. Please, check your email for further instructions.
Stripe payment provider with 3D Secure authentication for Strong Customer Authentication (SCA) support. Note, it doesn't allow to use recurring payments with trial period.
Activate(Deactivate) provider. Note. It's recommended to use SSL for better payment processing.
Hide provider if you don't want to accept new payments but already have active subscriptions.
Your Public Key generated in Stripe for 'live' mode
Your Stripe Secret Key for 'live' mode
Your Public Key generated in Stripe for 'test' mode
Your Stripe Secret Key for 'test' mode
Enable amount checking for Stripe Webhooks (recomended). However checking should be disabled when discounts and coupons are used.
Enable SSL connection to communicate with Stripe. Note. URLs below will be updated after saving.
Thank you! Subscription created. Please, check your email for further instructions.
Cannot change subscription details. Recheck provided data and try again.
Cannot change billing information. Recheck provided data and try again.
You need to select some plan here
16 digits without spaces describing your card number
You need to enter card number here
You need to enter expiry date in specified format here
Three digits from the back side of your card.
You need to enter card CVV here
Payment provider which is working in pairs with Stripe Connect app.
Recommended. The provider should be hidden in WEB because it can be used in mobile app only.
It's the app-specific unique code to receive receipts for auto-renewable subscriptions.
URL for App Store Server Notifications
Thank you! Subscription created. Please, check your email for further instructions.
